comments:
I download  eclipse-SDK-3.2M5-win32 
When I launch my program,I found a exception as following:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/eclipse/core/runtime/ISafeRunnable
...
at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TypedListener.handleEvent(TypedListener.java:137)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.EventTable.sendEvent(EventTable.java:66)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.sendEvent(Widget.java:925)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.runDeferredEvents(Display.java:3287)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.readAndDispatch(Display.java:2907)
...

Then I found  some classes that list in the API of org.eclipse.core.runtime  does not exist in the file org.eclipse.core.runtime_3.2.0.v20060216.jar,such as
ISafeRunnable, IStatus,ListenerList.I don't know why you made a mistake like this,maybe it's my mistake,and I'm gladly to report this to you.

The org.eclipse.core.runtime plugin has been split into several different plugins.  If you are running an Eclipse application, these new plugins will automatically be added to your plugin's classpath and you won't notice.  If you are running a standalone application, you will have to add these new JARs to your classpath.  The types you mention are now in eclipse/plugins/org.eclipse.equinox.common...jar
